thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com | 2 of 806
thread.title: Fred Cross

author: Fred Cross
title: Fred Cross
text: I purchase ink online sometime back and boy was it a mistake. Did not last anytime. I decided to quit getting ripped off and only buy HP. Time passed and I noticed InkFarm. I decided to once again take a shot at ordering something besides HP. Best decision I have made in a while. I will continue to order as long as I get such great satisfaction. I have not been disappointed. Don't get burned and stay burned. Have faith. Great folks to deal with and not get taken to the cleaners.
